data.title: Have a Birthday Party at The Movies – Hollywood Blvd Cinema – Dinner and a Movie
data.text:
Have a Birthday Party at The Movies

DIY

No need to set anything up in advance with our event coordinator. Simply purchase the tickets and select your seats in advance online for a general public show. Website showtimes get updated the Tuesday prior. Typically first showtime for a kid’s movie is around 1pm on the weekend. Once you are in the theater feel free to order off of the menu as usual or purchase kids meals for each of the children. For $10 kids (under the age of 12) can select a slice of cheese pizza, Mac & cheese, grilled cheese or a hot dog with a soft drink & popcorn box included. No outside food (including cake) or beverage is allowed. Party will be sat with general public.

LITTLE RASCALS PARTY– $400 RENTAL (For a limited time)

30 Guest Minimum

Only available at 11am, Saturday and Sundays. Limited availability.

A private auditorium for up to 220 guests. You can select from any current release film. Additional concession & meal package options listed below. Theater access will begin at 11am with a Birthday slide up on the screen so you can enjoy cake and gifts. Movie will begin at 11:30, after the movie is completed lights so you can enjoy the theater until 2pm.

A- Popcorn, Non- Refillable beverage (bottle of water/ juice box / milk or can of Starry). $6

B- Popcorn, Non- Refillable beverage (bottle of water/ juice box / milk or can of Starry) & movie candy. $10

C- Popcorn, Non- Refillable beverage (bottle of water/ juice box / milk or can of Starry) & slice of cheese pizza. $10

** To keep this option at a lower price and not include a gratuity fee, no server will be in your theater. You are able to order additional items at the front bar once the theater is open for public viewings (Typically noon). Event must be booked a minimum of 3 weeks prior to event date.

OPTION 1 OR OPTION 2 – On Main Event Page

RED CARPET

30 Guest Minimum

A private auditorium for up to 220 guests. Available at different price points for evening and day events. You can select from a current release film, at times advance release film, Blu- Ray, Sporting Event, Gaming device etc. The event will be customized to your preferences. Your guests can be served from an array of food and drink options: Full menu, Limited menu, Buffet, Set Plated meal or even just cocktails & appetizers. All packages do include service staff & a gratuity. Now offer Candy & Popcorn Buffet options as well!

CLICK HERE to view our Auditoriums & Party Spaces.

Whatever your event’s size, time, budget, or scope requirements are, Hollywood Blvd has a package for you! For more information, please contact our event coordinator at
